name: Pillow From Vintage Elton John Concert Tshirt
description: Have Elton John smile at you every single day with this throw pillow made out of a recycled vintage concert t-shirt. Embellished with rhinestones, studs and sparkles (in true Elton fashion) this pillow will add one-of-a-kind flare to any room! Be green and fabulous at the same time! It is stuffed with an 18 inch square pillow form filled with 100% all new polyester fill. There is a zipper on the bottom so that it the cover can be washed (hand-washing in cold recommended). If you have a shirt that you'd like to turn into a pillow let me know! I can also find specific band tees for you. For more designs check out www.danglorang.com

name: Pantera Pillow - Made out of Vintage Tour T-shirt
description:
Channel your inner rock star with this Pantera pillow.

Made out of a recycled vintage concert t-shirt from 1998 tour. Embellished with rocking studs and nailheads.

18 x 18 pillow with zipper to allow for spot cleaning.
Stuffed with 100% polyester fiber fill.

If you have a vintage rock tshirt that you'd like turned into a pillow let me know! 

For more designs go to www.danglorang.com

name: Throw Pillow made of recycled vintage Garth Brooks tshirt
description:
Vintage recycled Garth Brooks tshirt turned into a plush throw pillow embellished with pink and purple rhinestones and nailheads.

18 x 18 pillow with zipper to allow for spot cleaning.
Stuffed with 100% polyester fiber fill.

If you have a vintage rock tshirt that you'd like turned into a pillow let me know!

For more designs or for custom orders go to www.danglorang.com

name: Throw Pillow Made of Recycled Vintage Rage Against The Machine Pillow out of Vintage T-shirt
description:
Throw Pillow Made of Recycled Vintage "Rage Against The Machine" Tshirt Embellished with Pyramid studs and square studs in brushed dark silver.

18 x 18 pillow with zipper to allow for spot cleaning.
Stuffed with 100% polyester fiber fill.

If you have a vintage rock t-shirt that you'd like turned into a pillow let me know! For more designs go to www.danglorang.com

name: Radiohead Pillow Made Out of Vintage "Hail To The Thief" Tshirt
description:
Invite Radiohead into your livingroom with this throw pillow created out of a recycled vintage Radiohead t-shirt.

From the band's 6th studio album "Hail to The Theif" this pillow is soft and comfy - just like your favorite t-shirt!

A must for any Radiohead fan, this pillow had been embellished with studs and faux leather straps.

It is stuffed with an 18 inch square pillow form filled with 100% all new polyester fill. There is a zipper on the bottom so that it the cover can be washed (hand-washing in cold recommended).

If you have a vintage rock tshirt that you'd like turned into a pillow let me know! For more info and custom orders go to www.danglorang.com
